metadata.description: A sprawling metropolis built from scavenged materials in the ruins of an old city. Skyscrapers made of salvaged steel and concrete stretch towards the smog-choked sky, while makeshift shelters and shantytowns sprawl across the surrounding wasteland.
metadata.atmosphere: Energetic, chaotic, and slightly lawless, with a hint of nostalgia for the lost past.
metadata.significance: Hub for trade and commerce in the post-apocalyptic world, where Vivas Guardians often gather information and resources for their missions.
